of Appendix Further and with respect to Customer only Customer represents and warrants to Company continuing throughout the term of this Agreement as follows i all acts necessary to the valid execution and performance of this Agreement have been duly adopted ii with respect to the contractual obligations hereunder and performance thereof it is not entitled to itself or its revenues or assets from a suit b jurisdiction of court c relief by way of injunction order for specific performance or recovery of property d attachment of assets or e execution or enforcement of any judgment iii indentures to which it is a party its constitutional and governing documents and applicable law and iv its obligations to make payments hereunder do not constitute any kind of indebtedness of Customer
